Realme Siapkan Diskon 50% di Festival Belanja Online
04 Nov 2019, 17:24 by Adi Fida Rahman - detikInet


Foto: detikINET/Anggoro Suryo Jati

Jakarta - Festival pesta belanja online 11.11 sudah di depan mata, banyak vendor ponsel pun bersiap memberikan diskon spesial. Salah satunya Realme yang akan memberikan diskon hingga 50%.Realme memastikan akan berpartisipasi dalam Festival Belanja Online dengan menghadirkan program khusus yakni Mega Sale 11.11. Vendor asal China itu berkolaborasi dengan Shopee, Lazada, Akulaku, dan realme.com.Di Mega Sale 11.11 akan ditawarkan Realme 3 (3+64GB), Realme 5 (3+32GB) kemudian Realme 3 Pro (6+64GB) yang akan dijual dengan harga khusus selama satu hari penuh. Tidak hanya smartphone, Realme Buds Wireless juga akan mulai ditawarkan pada 11 November 2019.Realme turut menjanjikan akan memberikan beberapa voucher yang dapat digunakan selama Mega Sale 11.11. Ada tiga channel untuk mengumpulkan lucky draw yaitu realme.com, Shopee dan Lazada. Pelanggan cukup memainkan Mystery Box yang dihelat hingga 10 November mendatang."Mega Sale 11.11 akan menghadirkan pengalaman belanja online yang unik. Dan pada satu hari tersebut anak-anak muda di Indonesia bisa mendapatkan smartphone impian mereka dengan harga khusus," kata Palson Yi, Brand Manager Realme Indonesia dalam keterangan resminya, Senin (4/11/2019). Realme Prepare a 50% discount at the Online Shopping Festival
Nov 04 2019, 17:24 by Adi Fida Rahman - detikInet


Photo: detikINET / Anggoro Suryo Jati

Jakarta - 11.11 online shopping party festival is in sight, many mobile vendors are preparing to give special discounts. One of them is Realme which will give discounts up to 50%. Realme ensures that they will participate in the Online Shopping Festival by presenting a special program namely Mega Sale 11.11. The Chinese vendor collaborates with Shopee, Lazada, Akulaku, and realme.com. At Mega Sale 11.11 will be offered Realme 3 (3 + 64GB), Realme 5 (3 + 32GB) then Realme 3 Pro (6 + 64GB) which will be sold with a special price for one full day. Not only smartphones, Realm Buds Wireless will also be offered on November 11, 2019. Realme also promises to provide several vouchers that can be used during the Mega Sale 11.11. There are three channels to collect lucky draw namely realme.com, Shopee and Lazada. Customers simply play the Mystery Box held until November 10. "Mega Sale 11.11 will present a unique online shopping experience. And on that one day young children in Indonesia can get their dream smartphone at a special price," said Palson Yi, Brand Realme Indonesia Manager in his official statement on Monday (11/04/2019).
